Package it.seba.juno.manger

Class SerializationManager

java.lang.Object
it.seba.juno.manger.SerializationManager
public class SerializationManager extends Object
Provide a way to save game preferences to disk, implemented using singleton pattern.
Author:
Sebastian Rapetti
